text: Thumbsucker is the soundtrack to the film of the same name, which is based in the novel of the same name by Walter Kirn. It was released on September 13, 2005 under the Hollywood Records label. It was originally intended to be created by Elliott Smith, but after his death in 2003, The Polyphonic Spree was chosen to complete it when director Mike Mills attended a performance of theirs and was impressed. Three tracks by Smith remain on the release. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:The Polyphonic Spree albums Category:Elliott Smith albums Category:Good Records albums Category:2005 soundtrack albums Category:Hollywood Records soundtracks Category:Pop soundtracks Category:Comedy film soundtracks Category:Drama film soundtracks
title: Thumbsucker (soundtrack)
